scripts.build: npm run clean && tsc && cp -rf src/config www/config && cp .npmrc www/.npmrc && cp package.json www/package.json && cd www && zip -r Archive.zip . && cd ..
scripts.build:dev: npm run clean && tsc && copy "src/config" "www/config" && copy ".npmrc" "www/.npmrc" && copy "package.json" "www/package.json" && cd www && bestzip ../Archive.zip * && cd ..
scripts.deploy:dev: eb setenv AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID=$AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID AWS_BUCKET=$AWS_BUCKET AWS_REGION=$AWS_REGION AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY=$AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY AWS_PROFILE=$AWS_PROFILE DB_PORT=$DB_PORT JWT_SECRET=$JWT_SECRET PORT=$PORT POSTGRES_DB=$POSTGRES_DB POSTGRES_HOST=$POSTGRES_HOST POSTGRES_PASSWORD=$POSTGRES_PASSWORD POSTGRES_USERNAME=$POSTGRES_USERNAME RDS_DIALECT=$RDS_DIALECT URL=$URL && eb use udagram-api-dev && eb deploy udagram-api-dev
scripts.deploy: eb use udagram-api-dev && eb deploy udagram-api-dev
